title: Hive Piscine
description: Ah intensive 4-week selection period where you learn the basics of coding and the peer-to-peer learning method.

title: Hive Main Curriculum
description: Deep dive into C programming, algorithms, graphics, and web development. Validates your skills through projects.

title: Full Stack Program
description: Master modern web technologies (React, Node.js, TypeScript, AWS, Docker) in 6 months.

title: Data Science & AI
description: Learn Python, SQL, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning to become a Data Scientist.

title: Vocational Qualification in Business
description: A comprehensive vocational program covering business basics and ICT skills.

title: Full Stack Open
description: Deep dive into modern web development: React, Redux, Node.js, MongoDB, GraphQL and TypeScript.

title: Vocational Qualification in ICT
description: Learn to become a software developer or IT support specialist in a practical vocational setting.

title: Java Intensive
description: Become a Junior Java Developer in 12 weeks with guaranteed job interviews.

title: C# .NET Intensive
description: Accelerated learning path to becoming a .NET developer.

title: Master of Computing Sciences
description: Specializations in Human-Technology Interaction, Machine Learning, and Software Engineering.

title: MSc Computer Science and Engineering
description: Focus on AI, systems engineering, and wireless comms giving a strong theoretical and practical base.

title: Software Engineering MSc
description: Solving real-world problems using software. Focuses on sustainable software development.

title: Information Technology BEng
description: A comprehensive bachelor's degree covering networking, cloud, and IoT.

title: Business Information Technology
description: Combine business know-how with modern IT skills. Very popular in Helsinki.

title: Cyber Security Bootcamp
description: Intensive online training to become a junior penetration tester or security analyst.
